text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here!
Yes its me Bob...
Join me for learning street with Bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our phonics show.
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Enchanting and energetic! Our next performer is Mr. E!”

Ehhhhhhhhh-xactly…
That’s me

Mr. E to the tee 
The eh-eh sound is what I make
The eh-eh sound is all it takes

Here’s an elephant, strong and big,
Look, he’s even wearing a wig
Eh-Eh… elephant Eh-Eh… elephant

Hear the growl in my tummy
I’m looking for something yummy
There it is ….Eh-eh… egg  Eh-eh… egg egg

Look at me, Look at me
The coolest engine that can be.

Eh-Eh… engine
Eh-Eh…engine

He’s an elf and quite cheeky
His belt buckle is so sleeky!
Eh-eh-eh… elf Eh-eh… elf

Here comes the Emperor
He loves his bread and butter
Eh..eh..eh Emperor Eh..eh… Emperor

Have you seen a gem so green?
An emerald fit for a queen
Eh eh eh Emerald  Eh eh Emerald

You see this sign everywhere
An exit sign here and there
Eh-eh-eh… exit   eh-eh… exit

You see this sign everywhere 
An enter sign here and there
Eh-eh-eh… enter Eh-eh… enter

Mr.E is a very good friend
 But time is up, we have to end
Eh-eh-eh… end Eh-eh… end

Ehhhhhhhhh-xactly…That’s me
Mr. E to the tee

The eh-eh sound is what I make
The eh-eh sound is all it takes!
Judges, can we have the scores!

Exciting! Enriching! Excellent!
Entertaining! Elegant!
Thankyou Mr. E, and Judges
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then goodbye!
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
